about_the_game:
Welcome to Suds - Unite, Defend, Forgive

Step into the vibrant world of Suds - a place where strategy, camaraderie, and cuteness converge. You are a Sud - a charming, cute, and courageous being tasked with the defence of your home. Your village, a lively settlement nestled in a lush green valley, brimming with oversized mushrooms, tall flowers, and hollow tree trunks, is under threat from envious enemy slimes. Only you and your allies have the power to baffle these invaders. But beware, not all is as it seems...

🚩 Choose Your Strategy

Experience thrilling gameplay in three distinct modes:

🌪️ Endless Mode: In this relentless battle, your primary task is to survive an onslaught of enemy slimes as they march towards your village. As waves of foes intensify, so does the pressure to strategise effectively and utilise each Sud's unique abilities to their fullest potential. You must be prepared to make sacrifices, forge alliances, and work together to ensure the survival of your team. The game concludes when a teammate falls, and the Sud with the most points scored during the game round claims victory.
⚔️ Last Standing Mode: Your objective remains the same, but the stakes are higher. The winner isn't the one with the most points; it's the one who manages to stay alive the longest. Will you take a defensive stance and hold down the fort, or will you charge headfirst into the fray? The choice is yours, but remember, in Suds, no Sud stands alone.
❤️ Save and Forgive the Traitor Mode: The challenge deepens as one of your fellow Suds falls under the enemy's control. As you fend off the relentless enemy slimes, your mission is to rescue your turned teammate without causing them harm. Careful, though, as the enemy will try to turn all the good Suds evil. Your team wins if you successfully complete all 20 waves or lose if you kill the turned Sud or if all Suds become evil. Can you remain steadfast when trust shatters and friendships are tested?

🎮 Offline Quests

Aside from the thrilling multiplayer mode, Suds also provides an enriching offline single-player mode packed with quests and missions. This mode introduces additional enemies and challenges, enhancing your overall gameplay experience while you're offline. Each quest is carefully designed to test your strategic skills and deepen your understanding of the Suds universe.

🎨 Express Your Uniqueness
Every Sud is a unique individual, and you have the freedom to reflect your personality through your in-game character. Suds features a shop full of items and customisations, allowing you to create a Sud that mirrors your style. Will you choose the shiniest armour, the fastest boots, or perhaps a special cloak that sparks with magic? The choice is yours, and the possibilities are endless.

💥 Power-ups and Secrets

With 'Suds', we have designed a range of power-ups, each adding a distinctive advantage and playstyle to your gameplay. The specifics? We're keeping that as a thrilling surprise for you to explore in the game. Dive into the world of 'Suds', encounter these power-ups, and unleash their magic to ensure the safety of your village!

ext_user_account_notice: To participate in our game's online multiplayer matchmaking, players must register for an account within the game. While we require all users to register, we do not require the use of a real email address during the registration process. However, we do encourage users to provide a valid email address in order to receive important updates and news about the game. Please note that without a registered account, players will not be able to participate in the online multiplayer features of the game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or later (64-bit only), or other compatible Linux distribution
  • Processor: Dual-core, 64-bit Intel or AMD CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or later compatible video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 440.62 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible sound card
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: The game may run on lower-end systems but may require lowering graphics settings.

short_description: Join the Suds and protect their village from invading evil slimes. Compete to defeat the most enemies and climb the world leaderboard. With engaging gameplay, stunning graphics, and cute characters, Suds is an adventure you won't want to miss!
